title: Chapter 2273 - Chapter 2273: Nine Supremes Versus Non-Human Prodigies
body:
Chapter 2273 - Chapter 2273: Nine Supremes Versus Non-Human Prodigies

Chapter 2273: Nine Supremes versus non-human prodigies

Translator: 549690339

The few people from the Black Tortoise forest were all very confident.

Among the younger generation in the heaven realm, they were all at the peak of existence, with unparalleled talent.

They firmly believed that as long as they grew up, they would be able to reverse the current situation of the heaven realm, defeat the alien races, and even lead the heaven realm Army to kill their way to the evil god Realm.

They didn’t even put the young heaven’s favorite of the non-human race in their eyes.

“I’ll go out with you!”

Updated on B0XƝ0VEL.COM

Heavenly venerate six sages said as he stepped forward, followed by a few other celestial emperors.

The four paragons of the Black Tortoise forest also stepped out and appeared outside the two world city. They stopped not far away from the outsiders.

“You’re finally here. I thought you didn’t dare to fight!”

One of the foreign beings said.

in the contest of the younger generation, the heaven realm is not afraid of anyone!

Heavenly venerate six sages said coldly.

“Since that’s the case, let’s begin. You can choose any of the four prodigies of our realm!”

The alien imperial clan heavenly Emperor said.

At this moment, the four from the Black Tortoise forest were also sizing up the four foreign Young heaven’s favorites.

When they saw the young man from the royal family, their eyes turned serious.

Everyone knew that the Royal non-human races were extremely rare, but each one of them had terrifying battle power and endless potential.

They didn’t care about the other non-human heaven’s favorites, but they had to take the Royal non-human race seriously.

“I’ll go first!”

The Black Tortoise forest spoke first and stepped forward. His gaze scanned the four non-human heaven’s favorites before finally landing on the burly non-human.

The burly alien race was the most widespread and numerous race among the alien races. The people in the heaven realm knew this race the best.

The Black Tortoise forest would naturally choose the one they were most confident in.

“You, fight me!”

The Black Tortoise pointed at the burly alien.

“You’re choosing me?”

The three eyes of the burly alien opened and closed, emitting a cold killing intent.

He felt that he had been underestimated when he was the first one to be chosen.

kid, it’s your bad luck that you chose me first. Remember, the one who defeated you is called Wei Mo!

A burly alien stepped out, exuding a powerful aura.

True Emperor!

Without a doubt, the foreign youth Wei Mo had already stepped into the true Emperor realm.

“There are strong and weak true emperors too. Kill!”

The Black Tortoise forest moved. He pushed out with both hands, and two stars appeared, blasting toward Wei Mo.

“Small tricks!”

destroy! Vimo dandan said, and two beams of destructive light shot out of his third eye.

Bang! Bang!

The Black Tortoise forest’s two stars were easily destroyed by the other party.

Xuanwu Lin’s expression darkened slightly. He quickly formed a seal with his hands, and stars appeared around him one after another. There was a total of 360 stars.

“Heavenly cycle stellar fist!”

The Black Tortoise forest didn’t hold back at all. He directly used his strongest killing move and raised his combat strength to the extreme.

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!

One star after another streaked through the air, shooting toward Wei Mo with a long tail.

the Black Tortoise forest’s combat strength has increased a lot!

that’s right. A few years ago, when he fought with Lu Ming in yaoguang ancient city, he was only equivalent to a third stage true Emperor. Now, he’s already a fifth stage true Emperor. His improvement is shocking. He’s indeed a peerless genius!

Many people from the heavenly realm were overjoyed.

The Black Tortoise forest must have suffered a great loss in the battle with Lu Ming. In the past few years, they had worked hard and improved tremendously.

They believed that this battle was in the bag!

But in the next moment, everyone from the heaven realm’s expression changed.

Wei Mo let out a long hiss, and his body was covered with a crystal-like purple light. A battle axe appeared in his hand, and his burly body rushed toward the Black Tortoise forest like a wild beast.

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz!

At the same time, Wei Mo held the battle-ax with both hands and continuously slashed at the stars.

Bang! Bang!

Those stars were like bubbles as they were easily split apart by Wei Mo.

Wei Mo strode forward, his battleaxe continuously slashing out. One star after another was formed, but they were all broken.

Xuanwu Lin’s expression changed. With a loud roar, he pushed his palms forward.

In an instant, two hundred stars shot towards Wei Mo.

“Break!”

Wei Mo shouted coldly, and in an instant, he chopped out a few hundred times, filling the sky with axe shadows.

The stars exploded one after another.

“Kill!”

In the end, Wei Mo let out a loud roar and slashed out a shocking axe radiance.

A huge battle-ax with an energy of 10000 meters stood between the heaven and earth and suddenly slashed toward the Black Tortoise forest.

Xuanwu Lin’s pupils contracted sharply, and he exploded with all his strength. He fused all the stars into one, turning it into a huge star that blasted toward his opponent.

However, as the giant axe came down, the star exploded like a sun exploding in the sky. Black Tortoise Lin let out a blood-curdling scream as his body was sent flying. He flew for more than 10000 meters and fell to the ground, spitting out large mouthfuls of blood.

He was defeated!

The Black Tortoise forest had lost!

The heaven realm experts ‘faces were extremely ugly.

The powerful black Tortoise forest, which was one of the nine absolutes, was defeated without causing much trouble to the other party.

“This Wei Mo’s battle power is at least at the sixth stage true Emperor level!”

Someone said solemnly.

Many people gasped.

Did the foreign races also have such terrifying geniuses?

How could this be?

The heaven realm and the primordial realm had only produced a large number of prodigies when they reached their Golden Age. However, how could the foreign races also have such powerful prodigies?

it must be someone else. It’s impossible for the Outlanders to have many of such heaven’s favorites. Impossible!

Someone growled, finding it hard to accept.

“Is this the heaven realm’s top genius? Can’t even withstand a single blow!”

Wei Mo spoke coldly and looked at the Black Tortoise forest with disdain. He carried his battle-axe and walked back.

Heavenly venerate six sages and the other heavenly emperors all had ugly expressions on their faces.

The loss of the Black Tortoise forest would more or less affect the morale of the heaven realm.

“You must win the second round!”

The six Saint venerable transmitted his voice to the remaining three heaven’s favorites.

“I’ll do this round!”

The bald young man stepped forward.

This person’s combat strength was very strong. Back in the Alkaid ancient city, he had also made a move to deal with Lu Ming. Later, he was stopped by dandan and displayed shocking combat strength. He was much stronger than the Xuanwu forest at that time.

The bald young man’s gaze swept across the remaining three, and finally fell on the four-armed skinny foreign man.

“You, come out and fight me!”

The bald youth said.

“Then I’ll fulfill your wish!”

Smiling faintly, he took a step forward and appeared in front of the bald youth with astonishing speed.

Buzzzzzz!

Then, the skinny young man made his move. In a flash, his skinny body disappeared. The next moment, four extremely sharp blades appeared around the bald young man and slashed at him.

“So fast!”

Many people were shocked.

The speed of this skinny foreign being was simply too astonishing. His body was so fast that it was impossible to catch him.

“Crazy devil fist technique!”

The bald young man roared and punched out with both fists like a mad demon.

The terrifying fist force swept in all directions.

Buzzzzzz! Whoosh!…

The sound of metal vibrating reverberated in all directions.

In the blink of an eye, the two of them exchanged over a hundred moves, their speed fast to the extreme..
